metadata.name: PSScriptPolicyTest Creation By Uncommon Process
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of the "PSScriptPolicyTest" PowerShell script by an uncommon process. This file is usually generated by Microsoft Powershell to test against Applocker.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('__psscriptpolicytest_')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\powershell\\7-preview\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\program files\\powershell\\7\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\dsac.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\sdiagnhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\servermanager.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell_ise.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\wsmprovhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\sdiagnhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell_ise.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\windowspowershell\\v1.0\\powershell.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of the "PSScriptPolicyTest" PowerShell script by an uncommon process. This file is usually generated by Microsoft Powershell to test against Applocker.
